page.title: 09LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: We interviewed two ladies who have lived here for a long time.When they first lived here it was not so nearly as built up as it is now.The first estate was built about 24 years ago and the next one about 15 years ago. There was a big outcry when the estates where planned.Some poultry farms were knocked down.It also meant a lot more cars were introduced to the area. Longmoor Lake,now California Country park,was bought in 1935 and made into a holiday camp which took in coach loads of children from London every day.The facilities included a zoo ,boats,a miniture railway and speedway racing every weekend.There was also a pavilion in which dances took place.The pavilion was burnt down 15 years ago and the Council bought the camp and turned it into a country park
